name: Pen Dig
description:
Dig the ground using a pen and build a city!

Our game is a fun clicker idle game that gets you started with a school pencil. You will earn money by digging and breaking stones and you will improve your pens by earning money. There are many types of pens in the game, from the ordinary pen to the stone-filled pen, the digger-shaped pen, and the pointed pen.

In the second stage of the game, you will try to make a city by digging your mines. Travel around the city with the vehicle carrying the stones and build buildings and open new areas when you build the whole city. Throughout your game, you will create a game style that suits you and you will try to make a rich city.

Features:
-Fun clicker idle game
-Earn coins by digging and breaking stones
-Many different types of pens
-Dig mines to build a city
-Create your own style of play
-Strive to make a rich city

Pen Dig is a game that can be played with pleasure and played on many different levels. Earn money using a pen, build a city, and have fun! Download and play our game now!
